title: The Ocean Week community contests are here!

replies.body:
how do u get ocean week prizes 
{{champion:119}}
If you're referring to the community rewards during Ocean Week, this page has the complete breakdown http://promo.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/oceanweek2016/
can u riot make a free skin and champ for every oce player for every new year plz that will be awesome!
You already can! Riot Girl {{champion:18}}  from Facebook, Unchained {{champion:12}} from Youtube and Dreadknight {{champion:86}} from Twitter.
unchained ali is not available for oce

You could follow the original procedure, then send a ticket to riot that you have subscribe to their youtube channel and ask them to send you the skin.
well that's how i got mine.. {{champion:12}}

what is ocean week
{{item:2009}}
It's all here! http://promo.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/oceanweek2016/
If i was good at drawing or painting {{champion:32}} and i dont have enough money for cosplay.
We all start somewhere :)

this is awesome
I cant wait!
By "best" do you mean it looks professional and what the riot artwork creators make, or can it be like KiandyMundi or something
Can we submit more than one? I can't see anywhere it says we can't...
There is no entry limit :) Quality > quantity.
I'm broke and can't draw. {{item:3070}}

Heya! Question: can we submit more than one entry? I've got several pieces in the works for the art prize (though I honestly doubt I'd get more than one done by the end of the month, but I gotta check)
Yes, there is no entry limit :) Quality > quantity.
Mmmmmmmm this is awesome!

For the FanArt Competition, it says "You must either: depict at least one champion battling or defending Oceania during Ocean Week". Can it be anywhere in Oceania (e.g Harbor Bridge) or does it have to be one of the pictures showing the "Defence Locations"?
Anywhere in Oceania will be accepted, including the Harbour Bridge :)
So u could do it in a back alley in melbourne lel
The Cosplay rewards are a lot better :/

Art sit at computer and draw on your tablet or (draw on Paper. Cosplay needs actual material and it aint easy. Also they'll either need to make their costume look like the character and if possible their face. Basically Cosplay deserves better prizes then drawing/designing artworks imo.

But, art does take a pretty hard level of skill. Sure it's likely that more money would be spent on costumes because most artists would already have PS or all that but time and effort would be on the same level. Drawing, painting, etc, is art just like cosplay. So Trash Jinx is sort of right and you're sort of right too, but yea.

OR visually represent the Oceanic League of Legends community. So a barrel of Toxic waste would cover like 60% of the community.

Also, Giant Enemy Crabgot, really... {{champion:6}}
Could you please define the "Oceanic LoL community"?

We left it quite open ended so you can be as creative as you want. You can think about the countries/cities that make up the region (Aus, NZ, Fiji); themes around Australia Day with BBQs and our culture of sun and outdoors or Waitangi Day for NZ. There's also various unique flora and fauna that can't be found outside of OCE. And our sense of humour, e.g. we have a lot of "giant" things, like big prawn etc. Hope that helps!
Thanks! It helped quite a bit.
ummmm{{champion:105}}
Im over the knew brand he is soo op and its not funny ? anyone with me like if you play lb your gone bc of your passive an brands new passive dose to much damage riot plz nerf
how do you defend a city from the giant crab

You defend cities by playing any 5v5, 3v3 on League, like ARAM, Ranked, Normals. but not community servers or bots, If you win the game, you contribuye 1 point or 1+1 at ARAM today. and the point goes to defending the city,
Thank You
When you mean defend, I can have a random champion at Ayers Rock or something

The maximum file size is 5MB but when the blank canvas is set to 200 dpi and the minimum suggested dimensions, 2339x1654px, the file size is already 11.1 MB :/ Do I resize it after I've finished it? Or can I do it in the dimensions of your splash art?

When you say 11.1mb, do you mean the file size of the psd? The maximum file size of the 5mb applies to the jpg or png you convert to after you are done. If in photoshop, click 'save as' and on the bottom, change it from psd file to JPEG file or PNG file. It will save the picture as a single-layer file, so be sure to save the psd first!
ooh i did not know that hahaah thanks a lot ((:
You're welcome :3
The riot people are so nice >.<
{{summoner:31}}
For the art contest, is it okay to include landmarks in the piece? Would it count as advertisement?
Landmarks are ok. Which one(s) were you thinking of including?
I was thinking of setting the scene from the sky tower. If I don't include any restaurants and whatnot, is it okay?
Sky tower sounds great :) Yes, exclude any logos/branding etc.
Okay, cool thanks XD
That either represents ocean week or the oceanic community... Pretty sure you dont want a representation of the oceanic community. Trust me.
what is ocean week
All the info you need can be found here http://promo.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/oceanweek2016/
Riot can u also do a 1v1 lane like only for 2 random people play against each other that will be awesome :)

Does Digital Art Count??
